data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Xue, Qingquan, Webb, M. D., Zhang, Yalin (2013): Two new species of the leafhopper genus Anidiocerus (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Idiocerinae) from China. Zootaxa 3746 (3): 481-488, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3746.3.7
